name: De Bijen bestuivingstechniek
goal:
1. Providing pollination services to companies and consumers that grow crops in open and closed environments
2. Breeding and multiplication of three bee species (Osmia cornuta, Osmia bicornis and Apis mellifera)
3. Contributing to consumer awareness with regard to the importance of bee species focussing on non-apis bee species
4. Design and implement innovations with regard to pollination services in commercial surroundings
5. Design and sell consumer products to improve awareness and understanding with regard to non-apis bee species
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Participation in proposal: BeeVillage SEP-210407395 related to the Horizon2020, H2020-SFS-2017-2 call
